sentences.sContent: He gave Robin a mildly quizzical glance.
sentences.sCn: 他对罗宾投以戏弄性的一瞥。

synos.tran: 古怪的；引人发笑的；探询的；嘲弄的

trans.tranCn: 古怪的；引人发笑的；探询的；嘲弄的
trans.tranOther: If you give someone a quizzical look or smile, you look at them in a way that shows that you are surprised or amused by their behaviour
